author: Special Correspondent
text:
Students from Standard IV to Standard IX are invited to send in their entries for The Hindu Young World Painting Contest.

Students should choose any one of the given topics and draw the painting on a white drawing sheet (size 26 cm X 27cm) and forward it for the preliminary selection for the painting competition organised by The Hindu Young World, in association with Thyrocare.

The entries/paintings should be certified by their principal or art teacher that it was the original work of the participant and they should write their name, class, school, residential address, mobile number and e-mail id on the backside of the drawing sheet.

Topics for junior (Class IV to VI): at the toy/pet store, gully cricket, Sunday family picnic, cleaning my street, a day at the zoo, at the circus, water birds, scenes from a village, first visit to the public library, and summer activities.

Topics for senior (Class VII to IX): beach clean-up, camping out, New Year carnival, classical/rock music concert, book fair, underwater life, portraits of emotions, if dinosaurs existed today, domesticating the wild, retelling your favourite fairy tale and life without technology.

The selected students will be intimated through e-mail and they have to come to the venue (with the intimation letter) at their own cost on the specified date to participate in the finals to be held either on March 12 or 13. Topics for the finals will be given at the venue. Prizes for winners will be distributed in the afternoon. All finalists will receive certificates. Last date for receipt of entries is February 27.

Registration

For registration and other details, students have to log on to:www.thehindu.com/ ywpaintingwhere they can get their Unique ID, which should be mentioned on the top of the drawing. Entries should be sent to The Hindu, Circulation Department, 19 &20 ATT Colony, Lic Road, Coimbatore -641018. More details could be had from R. Amarnath on 90039 13286.
title: Entries invited for The Hindu Young World Painting Contest
